original_text: But the Levites shall do the service of the tent of meeting, and they shall bear their iniquity. It shall be a perpetual statute throughout your generations, and among the people of Israel they shall have no inheritance.
korean_text: 그러나 레위인은 회막에서 봉사하며 자기들의 죄를 담당할 것이요 이스라엘 자손 중에는 기업이 없을 것이니 이는 너희 대대에 영원한 율례라

sentences.original_text: But the Levites shall do the service
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 레위 사람들은 봉사를 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and they shall bear their iniquity
It shall be a perpetual statute
and among the people of Israel
